wikipedia_page.main: James Martin Hilary Graham-Brown (born 11 July 1951) is a former English professional cricketer and schoolteacher. He is now a playwright who writes under the nom de plume Dougie Blaxland.

response: *Biggles Flies A Fokker Home is a 2011 play written by former cricketer James Graham-Brown under the pen name, Dougie Blaxland.
* James Graham-Brown: County Cricket for Kent, Derbyshire and Dorset
Blaxland died at Temple Ewell, Kent, at the age of 78. He is the great-uncle of former Kent and Derbyshire player James Graham-Brown, who writes plays under the nom de guerre "Dougie Blaxland".
